speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Or let them look at at the uranium she sold that's now in the hands of very angry Russian.
politifact_statement: The special counsel "should be looking at the ... uranium Hillary Clinton sold that's now in the hands of very angry Russians."
verified_claim: Says Hillary Clintons State Department "approved the transfer of 20 percent of Americas uranium holdings to Russia, while nine investors in the deal funneled 145 million to the Clinton Foundation."
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump inaccurately suggests Clinton got paid to approve Russia uranium de
